text:
="preserve">Rebecca Nagan (b. March 3, 1968) is an actress and puppeteer best known for playing Rosie from the children's show "Rosie and Jim" in 1990. She performed Tootle, one of The Motorettes from "The Hoobs".
She has also starred in various other TV shows including "Becky and Barnaby Bear" as Barnaby and "Bug Alert" as Doodle Bug.
